Analysis: British Gas received a mix of positive and negative feedback on gas products, particularly around boiler servicing and repairs. Customers appreciate punctual engineers and efficient servicing: "Arrived in time. Serviced the boiler and cleaned up. Very professional." However, issues remain around post-installation faults ("Had a boiler fitted, a week later a slow drip appeared") and scheduling inefficiencies. Compared to competitors like CheckATrade-reviewed providers, British Gas is seen as reliable but sometimes slow to rectify problems. Competitors gain higher praise for flexibility in appointments and pricing transparency. British Gas could focus on post-service follow-ups and faster response times for issues arising after installations.

British Gas competes with HomeServe in this space, with mixed reviews. While positive feedback mentions ease of scheduling ("Very quick call-out when we had a leaking pipe"), negative reviews highlight unresolved issues and miscommunication ("Asked them to repair a leak, but they didn t know where it was and left"). HomeServe outperforms British Gas in responsiveness and engineer communication, suggesting an opportunity for British Gas to enhance diagnostic training and ensure engineers arrive better prepared for each job.
